text: Rockford is a city of Illinois in the United States. It is in Northern Illinois, at the junction of Interstate 90 and Interstate 39. It is one of the largest cities in the state of Illinois, with a population of 148,655 in 2020. An AHL team called the Rockford IceHogs play there. ==References== ==Other websites== * Rockford's Official city website Category:County seats in Illinois
title: Rockford, Illinois
